WorkItem.Description:
Hi guys,

I can't hide the 'WpfSimpleChart' legend in the StackedColumnChart with or without the CHartLegentVisibility property.

I added the following nuget package in my project : https://www.nuget.org/packages/ModernUICharts/ 

Here's my code in case I do something wrong :

<chart:StackedColumnChart Name="columnSupplier"
                    Style="{StaticResource MinimalChartStyle}"
                    ChartTitle="Tendance Fournisseur GBNC"
                    ChartSubTitle="Sur 12 mois"
                    __ChartLegendVisibility="Hidden"__
                    Background="White" Foreground="Black"
                    Margin="20,0,0,0">
                <chart:StackedColumnChart.Series>
                    <chart:ChartSeries DisplayMember="DateReleve" ValueMember="Percentage"
                                       ItemsSource="{Binding Path=AnalyticsSupplierEvolutionData}" />
                </chart:StackedColumnChart.Series>
            </chart:StackedColumnChart>

Thanks for the help

Comments.Message: The "__ChartLegendVisibility='Hidden__" was to make it bold ... but it doesn't work ! Consider it without the leading and trailing '__'.
